domain.name: Brand Category
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

text:
Just read a long coronavirus conspiracy rant on a ‘friend’s’ FB page, and it took every ounce of willpower in my body not to write, “You are a f*cking moron” in the comments. 

Dumb people make me so angry these days. I’ve never harbored this much anger.
